DOC.brief_summary: This substudy randomize trial investigate effect liraglutide body weight pain overweight obese patient knee osteoarthritis ( NCT02905864 ) . In parent trial , patient subject 8-week diet intervention phase include low-calorie diet dietetic counseling , randomize receive either liraglutide 3 mg liraglutide 3 mg placebo add-on dietetic guidance re-introducing regular food focus continued motivation engage healthy lifestyle . This substudy aim investigate impact , subsequent change biomarkers obese patient knee osteoarthritis follow randomization Liraglutide 3 mg Liraglutide 3 mg placebo treatment week 0-52 .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Obese Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis ; Weight Maintenance
